title: shared folder download dont work if zip downloads are disabled.
body:
### expected behaviour
i should be able to download the files

### actual behaviour
error message:
cloud not found.

it works if you download the file by clicking on the filename but not via the download button on the right side.

### steps to reproduce
1. turn off zip downloads
2. create folder with a few files in it and share it.
3. try to download the files.

### server configuration
operating system: (doesn't really matter)
ubuntu server 12.10
web server: (doesn't really matter)
apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu)
database: (doesn't really matter)
sqlite
php version: (doesn't really matter)
php 5.4.6-1ubuntu1.4 (cli) (built: sep  4 2013 19:36:09)
owncloud version:
5.0.11

### client configuration
browser: (doesn't really matter)
firefox 23.0.1
operating system: (doesn't really matter)
windows 7 x64
### logs
#### web server error log

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)

{"app":"php","message":"fopen(\/var\/www\/owncloud\/data\/name\/files\/filename.extension): failed to open stream: no such file or directory at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/files\/storage\/local.php#146","level":2,"time":"2013-09-13t23:45:41+00:00"}

{"app":"php","message":"module 'pdo_sqlite' already loaded at unknown#0","level":4,"time":"2013-09-13t23:45:39+00:00"}


original issue: https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/1257
